医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
气候变化是否加剧了中国人口老龄化？新研究发现，中国气温上升和人口老龄化加剧了与高温相关的死亡风险。该研究强调迫切需要制定政策来解决老年人与寒冷和炎热相关的健康风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Is-climate-change-turning-up-the-heat-on-Chinas-aging-population.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Is-climate-change-turning-up-the-heat-on-Chinas-aging-population.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=faf7099b-b646-484d-bafe-9e108d1c6540 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 23:12:00 -0400 Is climate change turning up the heat on China's aging population?
大麻合法化导致青少年使用模式发生惊人变化这项 JAMA 网络开放研究调查了大麻合法化对加拿大安大略省高危年轻人的影响，结果喜忧参半。虽然经常吸食大麻的人在合法化后减少了大麻的使用，从而减少了不良后果，但那些在合法化之前不吸食大麻的人随着时间的推移略有增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Cannabis-legalization-leads-to-surprising-shifts-in-youth-usage-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Cannabis-legalization-leads-to-surprising-shifts-in-youth-usage-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=612f4645-970b-417f-a841-e0cb4778361a Mon, 02 Oct 2023 23:04:00 -0400 Cannabis legalization leads to surprising shifts in youth usage patterns
生活方式的调整如何成为预防记忆丧失的新屏障：US POINTER 研究深入探讨US POINTER 研究旨在探讨运动、饮食和社交活动等生活方式的改变是否有助于保护有痴呆风险的美国老年人的认知功能。这项广泛的研究以芬兰成功的 FINGER 研究为蓝本，将于 2025 年完成，将涉及 2,000 名参与者，重点关注多元化和文化背景的策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/How-lifestyle-tweaks-could-be-the-new-shield-against-memory-loss-US-POINTER-study-dives-in.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/How-lifestyle-tweaks-could-be-the-new-shield-against-memory-loss-US-POINTER-study-dives-in.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ba2cbd80-99f4-419a-8569-bcdf36cd750d Mon, 02 Oct 2023 22:35:00 -0400 How lifestyle tweaks could be the new shield against memory loss: U.S. POINTER study dives in
GPT-4 在医疗软技能方面击败了人类医生研究人员评估了人工智能模型 GPT-4 和 ChatGPT 在美国医疗执照考试问题上的表现，这些问题侧重于判断力和同理心等软技能。 GPT-4 的表现优于 ChatGPT 和人类测试者，正确回答了 90% 的问题，而 ChatGPT 的准确率为 62.5%。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/GPT-4-beats- human-doctors-in-medical-soft-skills.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/GPT-4-beats- human-doctors-in-medical-soft-skills.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d5c45957-f07a-4863-b5ba-65b5360ece00 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 21:21:00 -0400 GPT-4 beats human doctors in medical soft skills
海藻能成为未来的超级食品和药物吗？研究人员整合了海藻的多种营养和药用功效，宣传其在食品、营养保健品和药品方面的潜力。该研究还强调了工业应用中的挑战和机遇，呼吁进行更多研究来优化提取和精炼工艺。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Could-seaweeds-be-the-superfood-and-medicine-of-the-future.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Could-seaweeds-be-the-superfood-and-medicine-of-the-future.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=046f7f03-205f-43d2-9976-c8d39df98adc Mon, 02 Oct 2023 19:15:00 -0400 Could seaweeds be the superfood and medicine of the future?
按时钟吃饭：进餐时间如何调整肝脏的昼夜节律《自然通讯》的一项研究深入研究了肝脏的生物钟如何响应进餐时间，影响脂肪代谢和其他身体过程。该研究强调了影响肝脏昼夜节律的复杂网络，该网络受蛋白质磷酸化和营养可用性的调节。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Eat-by-the-clock-How-meal-timing-tunes-your-livers-circadian-rhythm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Eat-by-the-clock-How-meal-timing-tunes-your-livers-circadian-rhythm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3687b84a-3031-473e-be2a-af2d567d8edb Mon, 02 Oct 2023 16:49:00 -0400 Eat by the clock: How meal timing tunes your liver's circadian rhythm
喝完但保留糖分：研究显示不加糖的咖啡与减肥有关《美国临床营养学杂志》最近的一项研究表明，增加不加糖咖啡的摄入量，无论是含咖啡因还是不含咖啡因，都与体重增加减少有关。然而，在咖啡中加糖可能会抵消这些健康益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Drink-up-but-hold-the-sugar-Unsweetened-coffee-linked-to-weight-loss-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Drink-up-but-hold-the-sugar-Unsweetened-coffee-linked-to-weight-loss-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26d07647-5f04-43cf-8026-1adcdbfd69d6 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 16:18:00 -0400 Drink up but hold the sugar: Unsweetened coffee linked to weight loss, study reveals
强迫性压力应对行为与大脑多巴胺依赖性习惯系统有关研究人员对大鼠进行了纵向研究，以测量早期形成的烦渴饮酒（或水）与强迫性烦渴饮酒（或水）对双侧输注α-氟哌噻吨、前背外侧纹状体（aDLS）-多巴胺（DA）受体拮抗剂的敏感性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Compulsive-stress-coping-behaviors-linked-to-brains-dopamine-dependent-habit-system.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Compulsive-stress-coping-behaviors-linked-to-brains-dopamine-dependent-habit-system.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cb55cf10-7f69-4556-90fe-b23158909522 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 10:15:00 -0400 Compulsive stress coping behaviors linked to brain's dopamine-dependent habit system
新研究显示，教幼儿做饭可以增强自控力和健康的饮食习惯研究人员介绍了一项随机对照试验的结果，该试验评估了“Recipe 4 Success”的效果，这是一种在美国威斯康星州和宾夕法尼亚州七个城市、村庄和城镇实施的预防性干预措施。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Teaching-toddlers-to-cook-boosts-self-control-and-healthy-eating-habits-new-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Teaching-toddlers-to-cook-boosts-self-control-and-healthy-eating-habits-new-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b0a2da3-c2bc-4091-b46e-121d76b3ca80 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 09:46:00 -0400 Teaching toddlers to cook boosts self-control and healthy eating habits, new study reveals
加拿大研究发现，大麻使用障碍与不良心血管事件风险增加约 60% 相关最近发表在《成瘾》杂志上的一项研究评估了大麻使用障碍（CUD）与心血管疾病（CVD）结果的关联。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Cannabis-use-disorder-linked-to-7e6025-higher-risk-of-adverse-cardioangio-events-Canadian-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231002/Cannabis-use-disorder-linked-to-7e6025-higher-risk-of-adverse-cardiovian-events-Canadian-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3bd377a5-78f7-4ddc-9176-d2be74f98983 Mon, 02 Oct 2023 09:23:00 -0400 Cannabis use disorder linked to ~60% higher risk of adverse cardiovascular events, Canadian study finds
